name: Up2015545:Rise to the Top
description:
Rise to the Top is a 3D platformer that uses perspectives to create a challenge. The goal is to rise the top of the level and get to the final platform which is yellow.

Only given a simple jump the player has to find a way to to complete the challenge without being able to move.

Will you rise to the challenge and reach the yellow square?

Controls:

Spacebar to jump.

To close the application Alt + F4 or tab out and close it
